name: A Messenger
description: As you walk the city streets a messenger approaches.

name: Rumors of Giant Raids in Mullin
description: You hear rumors of recent giant raids the city of Mullin.

name: Pestered by Shopkeeper
description: As you pass a shop burdened with trinkets, a shopkeeper beckons you in. "Hello weary traveler! Come in! Come in! I have the best prices in all of Tesslandia."
